title: UATV is the App
author: VD
content_html:
Elon Musk didn’t need any special app to know that the election was over well before CNN and other networks declared Donald Trump to have won the 2024 US Presidential election at 5 AM Eastern time on November 6th. All he had to do was watch the Darkstream.

JOE ROGAN: “Apparently Elon created an app and he knew who won the election four hours before the results. Dana White told me Elon said ‘I’m leaving. It’s over. Donald won.” I don’t know how he did it. Dana said Elon showed him the app and said “It’s over,” and then just left.”

Five hours before that, I declared that Trump had almost certainly won, and and 90 minutes later, after establishing the further confirmation for which I was waiting, I put it in writing on VP. The fact that Trump won Miami-Dade County in Florida, and Harris had hundreds of thousands of fewer votes in Broward and West Palm Beach counties, was all we needed to know that she wasn’t going to be able to squeak by in Pennsylvania, Georgia, Wisconsin, and Michigan the way that Biden did.

That’s a 12.4 percent lead in Florida. I don’t see how that’s overcome, if Trump is overperforming. I said this is going to be a bigger Trumpslide than the previous one. Than the previous two. But this really looks that way… Wow, this is huge. Trump won Florida by four times more than he did in 2020! We can almost certainly safely conclude that Trump is going to win at this point.

That was at 8:15 PM on November 5th, only 75 minutes after the first polls closed. The only modicum of doubt was whether this overperformance vis-a-vis 2020 was a unique situation due to Florida Governor DeSantis limiting the Democrat shenanigans, and the underperformance of Harris in certain specific other counties that we were tracking as soon as the polls closed at 8 PM was sufficient to prove that it was not. So I declared Trump the winner at 9:45 PM and went to bed.

This is why subscribing to UATV in general, and the Darkstream in particular, is a smart thing to do. You can literally know what’s happening before the richest man in the world does, and well before the mainstream media tells anyone else.

DISCUSS ON SG

So I declared Trump the winner at 9:45 PM and went to bed.
This is why

in general, and the Darkstream in particular, is a smart thing to do. You can literally know what’s happening before the richest man in the world does, and well before the mainstream media tells anyone else.
